description.value: If the status of the request is proposal, this valueset indicates the different types of proposal

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.
The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.
The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

div.p: **Definition:**The patient currently has a medical condition for which the vaccine is contraindicated or for which precaution is warranted.
**Definition:**There was no supply of the product on hand to perform the service.
**Definition:**The patient or their guardian objects to receiving the vaccine.
**Description:**The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
**Definition:**Therapy has been changed and new prescription issued
